short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will simulate marquee on a ton of nodes in the current page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will emulate marquee on a ton of nodes in the current page. It's super effective!

Disclaimer:
Not my problem if your graphics card can't hack it.
